title: Picture, 19th century
description: painting on glass of elaborate interior setting  with standing figure of richly attired lady in center in colorful brocaded robes offering gifts to jester-like man with curly beard and wearing red robes and skull cap who is in a half kneeling position at her feet, at either side stand female attendants also richly attired.  in carved teakwood frame with pierced lattice-fret borders.

tombstone.epitaph:
Picture, 19th century.
19th century. painted glass, wood. Gift of Mrs. Revell Hoover. 1968-69-2.
